original_text: And he did what was evil in the sight of the Lord, yet not as the kings of Israel who were before him.
korean_text: 여호와께서 보시기에 악을 행하였으나 다만 그 전 이스라엘 여러 왕들과 같이 하지는 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: And he did what was evil in the sight of the Lord,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 여호와 보시기에 악한 일을 행하였으나

sentences.original_text: yet not as the kings of Israel who were before him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 전에 있던 이스라엘 여러 왕들처럼은 아니었다
